pages.text: Necronite Ingots are a high-end crafting ingredient in Scalar Utils 5. They are used in all necronite armor, tools, and weapons.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire Necronite Ingots.
Above are alternative crafting recipes to acquire Necronite Ingots.
You can also use Necronite Ingots to make Necronite Blocks and Necronite Nuggets with the recipes above.
